title: Transmit any audio to AirPods for less than $30 (40% off)
description: Want to use your AirPods on a plane and perform other wireless feats? You need a Bluetooth transmitter and receiver like the Mymanu Link. (via Cult of Mac - Apple news, rumors, reviews and how-tos)
author: Cult of Mac Deals
excerpt: Want to use your AirPods on a plane and perform other wireless feats? You need a Bluetooth transmitter and receiver like the Mymanu Link.
text: Daily deals Enjoy wireless audio from any source with this easy-to-use Bluetooth transmitter/receiver. Photo: Cult of Mac Deals Bluetooth headphones offer a lot of freedom — but how free are you, really? Without a Bluetooth transmitter and receiver, you’re still limited to listening from your iPhone, Mac, iPad and other Bluetooth-compatible devices. And that rules out a lot of audio options. You can beat the Bluetooth blues with the Mymanu Link. This simple but handy gadget lets you stream from anything with an audio output jack. Then you can transmit that audio to your wireless earbuds or any Bluetooth speaker. And for a limited time, you can get your hands on a Mymanu Link for less than $30 (40% off). A Bluetooth receiver and transmitter for wireless audio, anywhere Actually, the Mymanu Link can be used as both a Bluetooth transmitter and a Bluetooth receiver, which means the uses are nearly endless. With this affordable dongle, you can listen to in-flight movies with your own earphones. (We heartily recommend AirPods Pro or AirPods Max.) Or you can hook up the Mymanu Link to your car stereo and enjoy a podcast while your passengers sleep. You can even use it with game consoles, gym equipment and stereos. And you can broadcast the sound to two sets of earbuds simultaneously. The Mymanu Link transmits with Bluetooth 5.0, offering a range of more than 30 feet. Plus, it comes equipped with aptX Low Latency, aptX and SBC audio codecs for premium audio quality. You get superior sound, whether you’re listening to movies, music or podcasts. This Bluetooth transmitter and receiver is portable enough to carry in a pocket along with your iPhone, but powerful enough to deliver up to 20 hours of playtime. (You can get even more if you let it charge with the included cable while in use.) In short, it’s a reliable way to get the most out of your wireless earbuds or headphones in any situation. Save on this bluetooth dongle for ultimate wireless audio Right now, you can get the Mymanu Link Bluetooth transmitter and receiver for just $29.97. Buy from: Cult of Mac Deals. Prices subject to change. All sales handled by StackSocial, our partner who runs Cult of Mac Deals. For customer support, please email StackSocial directly. We first published this post in February, 2024. It was updated in October, 2024 with new pricing information.
html:
• Daily deals

Bluetooth headphones offer a lot of freedom — but how free are you, really? Without a Bluetooth transmitter and receiver, you’re still limited to listening from your iPhone, Mac, iPad and other Bluetooth-compatible devices. And that rules out a lot of audio options.

You can beat the Bluetooth blues with the Mymanu Link. This simple but handy gadget lets you stream from anything with an audio output jack. Then you can transmit that audio to your wireless earbuds or any Bluetooth speaker. And for a limited time, you can get your hands on a Mymanu Link for less than $30 (40% off).

A Bluetooth receiver and transmitter for wireless audio, anywhere

Actually, the Mymanu Link can be used as both a Bluetooth transmitter and a Bluetooth receiver, which means the uses are nearly endless. With this affordable dongle, you can listen to in-flight movies with your own earphones. (We heartily recommend AirPods Pro or AirPods Max.) Or you can hook up the Mymanu Link to your car stereo and enjoy a podcast while your passengers sleep. You can even use it with game consoles, gym equipment and stereos. And you can broadcast the sound to two sets of earbuds simultaneously.

The Mymanu Link transmits with Bluetooth 5.0, offering a range of more than 30 feet. Plus, it comes equipped with aptX Low Latency, aptX and SBC audio codecs for premium audio quality. You get superior sound, whether you’re listening to movies, music or podcasts.

This Bluetooth transmitter and receiver is portable enough to carry in a pocket along with your iPhone, but powerful enough to deliver up to 20 hours of playtime. (You can get even more if you let it charge with the included cable while in use.) In short, it’s a reliable way to get the most out of your wireless earbuds or headphones in any situation.

Save on this bluetooth dongle for ultimate wireless audio

Right now, you can get the Mymanu Link Bluetooth transmitter and receiver for just $29.97.

Buy from: Cult of Mac Deals.

Prices subject to change. All sales handled by StackSocial, our partner who runs Cult of Mac Deals. For customer support, please email StackSocial directly. We first published this post in February, 2024. It was updated in October, 2024 with new pricing information.
